task_description: Transform 5,591-line HTML dashboard (E2I_Causal_Dashboard_V3.html) into a production-ready React 18 application with complex visualizations, state management, routing, and comprehensive testing

patterns.component_pattern: Functional components with TypeScript strict mode, named exports, React hooks
patterns.state_management: TanStack Query for server state, Zustand for client state
patterns.routing: React Router v6 with lazy loading
patterns.api_integration: Axios with TanStack Query, FastAPI backend on port 8000

existing_implementations.description: HTML dashboard prototype (5,591 lines) with Chart.js, Plotly, D3.js, Cytoscape visualizations. Backend FastAPI app exists with graph, memory, cognitive, explain, and rag endpoints.
